citations.narrative:
During this inspection, an employee stated that on August 5, 2023, a female giraffe (Zara) was found with her head under
a bar on the fence line in the outdoor enclosure. Employees tried to free her, but were unable to do so before she died.
The facility corrected this by installing a gate to prevent the giraffes from having access to the space underneath the bar.
The outdoor enclosure did not protect the animal from injury, and this resulted in death. The outdoor housing facilities
shall be structurally sound and shall be maintained in good repair to protect the animals from injury.
CORRECTION DATE: Corrected on 3/27/2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
3.125(a)  Critical
   
Facilities, general. 
During this inspection, an employee stated that on August 5, 2023, a female giraffe (Zara) was found with her head under 
a bar on the fence line in the outdoor enclosure. Employees tried to free her, but were unable to do so before she died. 
The facility corrected this by installing a gate to prevent the giraffes from having access to the space underneath the bar. 
The outdoor enclosure did not protect the animal from injury, and this resulted in death. The outdoor housing facilities 
shall be structurally sound and shall be maintained in good repair to protect the animals from injury.  
 
CORRECTION DATE: Corrected on 3/27/2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
 n
